UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: A new crustin homologue (SpCrus6) involved in the antimicrobial and antiviral innate immunity in mud crab, Scylla paramamosain.
Literature.Author: Du ZQ, Wang Y, Ma HY, Shen XL, Wang K , Du J, Yu XD, Fang WH, Li XC

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=<1.6µM),Bacillus megaterium(MIC=<0.8µM),Bacillus subtilis(MIC=<3.12µM),Vibrio alginolyticus(MIC=>25µM),Vibrio parahaemolyticus(MIC=>25µM),Vibrio harveyi(MIC=>25µM),Escherichia coli(MIC=>25µM),Pichia pastoris(MIC=>25µM),Candida albicans(MIC=<6.25µM)
